name: Jumpman Deluxe
overview: An AMOS based shareware Jumpman clone game created by Dreamware and published in 1996. The control has been altered to the point that Jumpman can turn around in mid-jump. The puzzles are different too - there are no bomb-triggered booby traps for example. The new time-triggered platforms are pretty cool. What's left is a pretty good Amiga platformer.
